subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Federer needed only 68 minutes to defeat Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 6-0, while Raonic outlasted Rafael Nadal, 4-6, 7-6 (10), 7-5, to set up a semifinal showdown at the BNP Paribas Open.
snippet: Federer needed only 68 minutes to defeat Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 6-0, while Raonic outlasted Rafael Nadal, 4-6, 7-6 (10), 7-5, to set up a semifinal showdown at the BNP Paribas Open.
